other_title: まじめにふまじめ　かいけつゾロリ

#03: "Ishi Noshi Kazoe Uta desu ka!! (イシノシかぞえうたでスカ!!)" by Rikako Aikawa and Motoko Kumai (eps 51-74)
#04: "Buwaatto Ikouze (ブワーッといこうぜ)" by Kouichi Yamadera (eps 75-97)
